General.Name: Gallantt Ispat Limited
General.Description: Gallantt Ispat Limited engages in production and sale of iron, steel, and power in India and internationally. The company operates through Agro, Steel, Power, and Real Estate segments. It offers sponge iron, mild steel billets, and re-rolled products. The company was formerly known as Gallantt Metal Limited and changed its name to Gallantt Ispat Limited in June 2022. Gallantt Ispat Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Gorakhpur, India.

4.Name: Mr. Dinesh Raghubir Prasad Agarwal B.Com. (H)
